---
category: news
title: "The AI-Powered Rabbit R1 Wants to Kill Your iPhone For Good"
excerpt: "The R1 is roughly half the size of an iPhone but works entirely using Rabbit’s “large action model” AI. Instead of interacting with individual apps and websites on a smartphone, users will instead be able to use voice commands to do everything that they want to do from ordering an Uber, to planning a trip abroad, to playing a song on Spotify."
